resources.string: ColorRush – tasks on logic, It is necessary to find the correspondence of the text on the left and the color on the right in the allotted time;
Computing – tasks on arithmetic, It is necessary to specify whether the arithmetic expression is correctly composed;
Reaction Tap – Tasks for reaction,It is necessary to do a click when changing the color on the screen;
tasks for attention, it is necessary to select all numbers in ascending order with the best speed;
Memory – memory development tasks,It is necessary to find all pairs of cards on the screen;
